meanings.definition: The state of being excessively active or energetic.
meanings.sent1: Her superactivity in class made it hard for others to focus.
meanings.sent2: The children's superactivity at the playground was a joy to watch.
meanings.sent3: His superactivity during the game of tag was both impressive and hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The superactivity of the squirrel gathering nuts was like a whirlwind in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The superactivity of the volcano was a sight to behold, spewing lava high into the sky.

meanings.definition: An excessive level of activity or energy.
meanings.sent1: The superactivity of the ants in the garden amazed the observers.
meanings.sent2: After drinking too much soda, he felt a burst of superactivity.
meanings.sent3: The superactivity of the puppy chasing its tail was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The superactivity of the market during the holiday season was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The superactivity of the city streets at rush hour was chaotic.
